MAIN_MESSAGE: We apologise that today's pre arranged work affecting your property in the LL18 postcode area of Rhyl is still ongoing. This is due to difficulties on site and we now expect power to be back on by 5.00PM.  We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 4.33PM on 3rd December 2020.
